Steam (ST): It felt as though I had been spinning through space... until gravity suddenly came back and threw me to the ground.
Umineko Project (UP): It felt as though I had been spinning through space, and gravity had suddenly come back and thrown me to the ground.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It felt as though I had been spinning through space until gravity suddenly came back and threw me to the ground.
PC Japanese (JP): つい先ほどまで宙を舞っていた自分が、唐突に浮力を失い、床にストンと落とされたような気持ち。
Russian (RU): Меня словно вращали в пространстве, пока тяжесть вдруг не вернулась и не сбросила меня на пол.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu senti como se estivesse girando através do espaço e, abruptamente, a gravidade retornou a mim e me jogou contra o chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這感覺就像，直到剛才還飄舞在半空中的自己，突然失去了浮力，撲通一聲，掉到地上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这感觉就像，直到刚才还飘舞在半空中的自己，突然失去了浮力，扑通一声，掉到地上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mi sentivo come se avessi roteato nello spazio fino a che la gravità non tornò all'improvviso e mi scaraventò a terra.

Steam (ST): Like when you're having a great dream, but you wake up suddenly, ...and all you remember about the dream was that it was fun. ...That sort of lonely feeling.
Umineko Project (UP): Like when you're having a great dream, but you're suddenly woken up, ......and all you can remember about the dream was that it was fun. ......That sort of lonely feeling.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Like when you're having a great dream, but you wake up suddenly, ......and all you remember about the dream was that it was fun. ......That sort of lonely feeling.
PC Japanese (JP): 素敵な夢を見ていたのに、唐突に起こされてしまい、……しかも何の夢を見ていたのか、楽しかったことだけはわかるのに、思い出せないかのような、……そんな寂しさ。
Russian (RU): Как когда видишь долгий сон, но вдруг просыпаешься...... и помнишь о сне лишь то, что он был весёлым. ......Одинокое чувство.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Assim como quando você está tendo um ótimo sonho, mas acaba acordando de repente, ......e tudo o que consegue lembrar é que o sonho era divertido. ......Esse tipo de sentimento solitário foi o que senti.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 其中帶有著一份，恰似“在正做著美夢時，被人突然叫醒，……而且只記得很開心，卻就是想不起做了什麼夢”般的，……淒涼。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 其中带有着一份，恰似“在正做着美梦时，被人突然叫醒，……而且只记得很开心，却就是想不起做了什么梦”般的，……凄凉。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Come quando si fa un sogno fantastico, ma ci si sveglia subito... e tutto ciò che ci si ricorda del sogno è che era divertente. ... Quel genere di sensazione malinconica.

Steam (ST): Though Beato had been borrowing my body, it was my own body that used magic.
Umineko Project (UP): Though Beato had been borrowing my body, it was my own body that used magic.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Though Beato had been borrowing my body, it was my own body that used magic.
PC Japanese (JP): ベアトに体を奪われていたとはいえ、確かに私の体は魔法を使っていたのだ。
Russian (RU): Хотя в меня вселилась Беато, использовала магию именно я.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Embora a Beato tivesse pegado meu corpo emprestado, era o meu próprio corpo quem estava usando aquela magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖說是被貝阿朵搶走了身體，但那時我的身體的確是施展了魔法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽说是被贝阿朵抢走了身体，但那时我的身体的确是施展了魔法。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sebbene Beato avesse preso in prestito il mio corpo, fu proprio il mio corpo ad utilizzare la magia.

Steam (ST): I could still feel that sensation in my hands.
Umineko Project (UP): I could still feel that sensation in my hands.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I could still feel that sensation in my hands.
PC Japanese (JP): まだ、両手にあの感触が残ってる。
Russian (RU): Я до сих пор чувствовала то ощущение в руках.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu ainda podia sentir aquela sensação em minhas mãos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我的雙手上，依舊留著那種感觸。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我的双手上，依旧留着那种感触。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Potevo ancora sentire nelle mie mani quella sensazione.

Steam (ST): The key ring over there had danced along with the movements of my fingers.
Umineko Project (UP): The key ring over there had danced along with the movements of my fingers.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The key ring over there had danced along with the movements of my fingers.
PC Japanese (JP): 私の指の動きにつられて、鍵束がそこでダンスを踊ったのだ。
Russian (RU): Кольцо для ключей кружило под движения моих пальцев.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O chaveiro que estivera dançando aos movimentos dos meus dedos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 隨著我手指的動作，鑰匙串在那翩翩起舞。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 随着我手指的动作，钥匙串在那翩翩起舞。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il portachiavi da quella parte aveva danzato secondo i movimenti delle mie dita.

Steam (ST): No, that's not quite it. The key ring and my fingers had danced together.
Umineko Project (UP): No, that's not quite it. The key ring and my fingers had danced together.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): No, that's not quite it. The key ring and my fingers had danced together.
PC Japanese (JP): いや違う。鍵束と、私の指が一緒に、ダンスを踊った。
Russian (RU): Нет, не совсем. Ключи и мои пальцы кружились вместе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não, não foi exatamente isso. O chaveiro e meus dedos estavam dançando em conjunto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不、錯了。那是鑰匙串與我的手指，在一起翩翩起舞。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不、错了。那是钥匙串与我的手指，在一起翩翩起舞。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): No, non è così. Il portachiavi e le mie dita avevano danzato insieme.

Steam (ST): That fun, that excitement... ...still tingled slightly in my hands...
Umineko Project (UP): That fun, that excitement......still tingled slightly in my hands......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That fun, that excitement......still tingled slightly in my hands...
PC Japanese (JP): その、楽しさ。わくわくが、……まだ、指にほのかに、残ってる……。
Russian (RU): Это веселье, волнение...... ещё покалывало в руках...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquela diversão, aquela empolgação......ainda permaneceu formigando suavemente em minhas mãos......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這份愉悅、興奮，……依舊，微微地留在我的手指上……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这份愉悦、兴奋，……依旧，微微地留在我的手指上……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quel divertimento, quell'eccitazione... formicolavano ancora nelle mie mani...

Steam (ST): "Whoops, that was close."
Umineko Project (UP): "Whoops, that was close."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「おっとー、いけないいけない。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「おっとー、いけないいけない」
Russian (RU): "Ой, ещё бы немного."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ops, foi por pouco."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「喔——唷，糟糕糟糕。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]

Steam (ST): Saying this, Belne-san suddenly turned around and picked up the key ring she had thrown down on the bed.
Umineko Project (UP): Saying this, Belne‐san suddenly turned around and picked up the key ring she had thrown down on the bed.

PC Japanese (JP): 鐘音さんが唐突にそう言いながら振り返り、ベッドの上に投げ出した鍵束を引っ手繰る。

Umineko Project (UP): She must have realized that I was staring at it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She must have realized that I was staring at it.

Steam (ST): "Almost had Yasu complain that I shouldn't leave keys lying about like this. I'd never put something down and forget about it."
Umineko Project (UP): "Almost had Yasu complain that I shouldn't leave keys lying about like this. I'd never put something down and forget about it."

Questo è... ciò che per me eri."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ao invés de serviçal, ......eu acho que seria mais divertido virar bruxa."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「比起傭人，……魔女似乎更有趣。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「比起佣人，……魔女似乎更有趣。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Anziché essere tale... preferirei essere una strega."

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Wh-What do you mean by witch...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "A, a witch...? ...What do you mean...?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Wh, what do you mean by witch...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ま、魔女って…。……何の話…？」
Russian (RU): "Ч‐что значит... ведьмой?.."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "B‐Bruxa...? ...O que quer dizer...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「魔、魔女…？……你在說什麼…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「魔、魔女…？……你在说什么…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "C-Che cosa vuoi dire con strega...?"

Steam (ST): "I did...and still do... wish I could be a servant loved and relied upon by everybody. ...But right now, I want to be a witch... even more."
Umineko Project (UP): "A servant who everyone loves and relies upon is......yeah, it's still something I'd love to be. ......But right now, .........I want to be a witch...even more."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "I did...and still do... wish I could be a servant loved and relied upon by everybody. ......But right now, I want to be a witch... even more."
PC Japanese (JP): 「みんなに愛されて頼りにされる使用人って、……うん、今ももちろん憧れるけど。……でも、今の私には……、………魔女の方が、憧れるの。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「みんなに愛されて頼りにされる使用人って、……うん、今ももちろん憧れるけど。……でも、今の私には……、………魔女の方が、憧れるの」
Russian (RU): "Я хотела... и по‐прежнему хочу... стать любимой всеми слугой, на которую будут полагаться. ......Но сейчас... я хочу быть ведьмой... ещё больше."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Alguém que todos amem e respeitem como serviçal é......sim, ainda é algo que eu adoraria ser. ......Mas agora, .........eu quero me tornar uma bruxa...ainda mais."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「受大家喜愛、仰仗的傭人，……嗯，雖然現在也當然對此有著憧憬。……但是，對現在的我來說……，………魔女，更令我憧憬。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「受大家喜爱、仰仗的佣人，……嗯，虽然现在也当然对此有着憧憬。……但是，对现在的我来说……，………魔女，更令我憧憬。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Io desideravo... e desidero tuttora... poter diventare una persona amata da tutti e su cui ognuno fa affidamento, lavorando fra i domestici. ... Ma ora, desidero ancora di più... essere una strega."

Umineko Project (UP): It was hardly surprising. ......All this about quitting as a servant was at least understandable.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was hardly surprising. ......All this about quitting as a servant was at least understandable.
PC Japanese (JP): 無理もない。……使用人を辞める云々という話ならばまだ理解も出来よう。
Russian (RU): Неудивительно. ......Уход из слуг ещё можно понять.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era difícil de entender. ......Tudo isso sobre deixar de ser serviçal era, no mínimo, compreensível.

Steam (ST): But she didn't know how to answer after hearing that her roommate wanted to become a witch...
Umineko Project (UP): But she didn't know how to answer after hearing that her roommate wanted to become a witch...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But she didn't know how to answer after hearing that her roommate wanted to become a witch...

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas ela não soube o que responder depois que eu disse que queria me tornar uma bruxa...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而換成，突然就聽對方講出了“憧憬魔女”什麼的，那就無言以對了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而换成，突然就听对方讲出了“憧憬魔女”什么的，那就无言以对了…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma non sapeva come rispondere dopo aver sentito che il suo compagno di stanza volesse diventare una strega...

Steam (ST): "A witch. {f:5:Beatrice}. ...You see, today, {f:5:Beatrice} possessed me and used my body to do magic. That unknown world felt so...thrilling. It was much more thrilling when I learned that I'd been selected as an Ushiromiya family servant.
Umineko Project (UP): "A witch. {f:5:Beatrice}. ......You see, today, {f:5:Beatrice} possessed me and used my body to do magic. That unknown world felt so......thrilling. It was far, far more thrilling than even the time I learned that I'd been selected as an Ushiromiya family servant."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "A witch. Beatrice. ......You see, today, Beatrice possessed me and used my body to do magic. That unknown world felt so...thrilling. It was much more thrilling than the time I learned that I'd been selected as an Ushiromiya family servant.
PC Japanese (JP): 「魔女。ベアトリーチェ。……今日ね、ベアトリーチェが私に乗り移って、私の体を使って、魔法を使ったの。その時、その未知の世界に、……こう、ぞくぞくっとしたものを感じたの。それは、右代宮家の使用人に推薦されたことを知らされた時よりも、ずっとずっと上。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「魔女。ベアトリーチェ。……今日ね、ベアトリーチェが私に乗り移って、私の体を使って、魔法を使ったの。その時、その未知の世界に、……こう、ぞくぞくっとしたものを感じたの。それは、右代宮家の使用人に推薦されたことを知らされた時よりも、ずっとずっと上」
Russian (RU): "Ведьма. {f:5:Беатриче}.......Знаешь, сегодня она вселилась в меня и творила чудеса. Этот неведомый мир казался таким... захватывающим. Гораздо захватывающе момента, когда я узнала, что меня выбрали слугой семьи Уширомия."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uma bruxa. {f:5:Beatrice}. ......Sabe, hoje a {f:5:Beatrice} me possuiu e usou o meu corpo para performar uma magia. Aquele mundo desconhecido foi tão......emocionante. Muito, muito além da emoção que senti na primeira vez em que fiquei sabendo que haviam me escolhido para servir à família Ushiromiya."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「魔女。貝阿朵莉切。……今天呀，貝阿朵莉切上了我的身，用我的身體，施展了魔法。在那時，我從那未知的世界中，……感到了像這樣，令人沸騰的東西。比起得知自己將被推薦去右代宮家當傭人的時候，這種感覺要遠遠在此之上。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「魔女。贝阿朵莉切。……今天呀，贝阿朵莉切上了我的身，用我的身体，施展了魔法。在那时，我从那未知的世界中，……感到了像这样，令人沸腾的东西。比起得知自己将被推荐去右代宫家当佣人的时候，这种感觉要远远在此之上。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Una strega. Beatrice. ... Vedi, oggi Beatrice ha preso il controllo di me e ha utilizzato il mio corpo per praticare la magia. Quel mondo ignoto mi sembrava così... elettrizzante. Era molto più elettrizzante di quando appresi che mi scelsero per lavorare fra i domestici della famiglia Ushiromiya.

Steam (ST): It was like learning about a new world. ...As though I'd been living in a world of darkness all my life and thought I knew what the world was like, then finally learned what light was and saw the world for the first time. It was...joy. ...Excitement."
Umineko Project (UP): "It was like learning about a new world. ......As though I'd been living in a world of darkness all my life and thought I knew what the world was like, then finally learned what light was and saw the world for the first time. It was...joy. ......Excitement."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It was like learning about a new world. ......As though I'd been living in a world of darkness all my life and thought I knew what the world was like, then finally learned what light was and saw the world for the first time. It was...joy. ......Excitement."
PC Japanese (JP): 知らなかった世界を初めて知ったような、……まるで、暗闇の世界だけに住んでて世界を全て知っているようなつもりになっていた私が、初めて光を知って、世界を目にするような。そんな、喜び。……興奮。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「知らなかった世界を初めて知ったような、……まるで、暗闇の世界だけに住んでて世界を全て知っているようなつもりになっていた私が、初めて光を知って、世界を目にするような。そんな、喜び。……興奮」
Russian (RU): "Я будто узнала о новом мире. ......Словно я всю жизнь жила в мире тьмы и знала, что из себя представляет мир, а потом наконец поняла, что такое свет, и впервые увидела настоящий мир. Это было... радостно. ......Волнующе."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Foi como aprender sobre um novo mundo. ......Como se eu estivesse vivendo até hoje em um mundo de escuridão, pensando saber como o mundo era, e agora eu finalmente aprendi o que é a luz e pude ver o mundo pela primeira vez. Tal...alegria. ......Tal empolgação."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「這是種，恰似首次獲知了未知的世界般，……簡直就像，一直住在黑暗的世界中，自以為通曉世界的一切的我，第一次看到光，看到了世界般的，喜悅。……興奮。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「这是种，恰似首次获知了未知的世界般，……简直就像，一直住在黑暗的世界中，自以为通晓世界的一切的我，第一次看到光，看到了世界般的，喜悦。……兴奋。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): È stato come apprendere di un nuovo mondo. ... Come se avessi vissuto tutta la mia vita in un mondo di tenebra e pensato di conoscere com'era il mondo, per poi finalmente capire che luce era e vedere il mondo per la prima volta. {n}Era... gioia. ... Eccitamento."

Steam (ST): Beato had only used my fingers, made a key ring dance, and turned a key into a butterfly before hiding it in a locker.
Umineko Project (UP): At that time, Beato had only used my fingers, made a key ring dance, and turned a key into a butterfly before hiding it in a locker.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): あの時、ベアトは私の指を介して、鍵束とダンスを踊り、鍵を一本、蝶に変えてロッカーの中に隠しただけだった。
Russian (RU): В тот раз Беато одними моими пальцами отправила кольцо для ключей в пляс и превратила ключ в бабочку, а потом спрятала его в шкафчике.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Naquele momento, a Beato apenas usou os meus dedos, fez o chaveiro dançar, e transformou a chave em uma borboleta antes de escondê‐la no armário.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那時，貝阿朵僅僅是以我的手指為媒介，令鑰匙串跳起舞來，將一把鑰匙變成了蝴蝶，藏到了儲物櫃中罷了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那时，贝阿朵仅仅是以我的手指为媒介，令钥匙串跳起舞来，将一把钥匙变成了蝴蝶，藏到了储物柜中罢了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In quel momento, Beato aveva usato solamente le mie dita, aveva fatto danzare un portachiavi, e aveva tramutato una chiave in una farfalla per poi nasconderla in un armadietto.

Steam (ST): But I'd understood it with my body.
Umineko Project (UP): But I had understood it with my body.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But I had understood it with my body.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、私の体は理解していた。
Russian (RU): Но моё тело подсказало мне.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas eu entendi com o meu corpo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，我的身體很清楚。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，我的身体很清楚。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma io l'avevo capito con il mio corpo.

Steam (ST): If I'd moved my fingers a different way, the ring could've flown into the air instead of just dancing, and I could've turned it into a scurrying lizard instead of a butterfly. ...I could've done anything.
Umineko Project (UP): If I had moved my fingers a different way, the ring could have flown into the air instead of just dancing, and I could have turned it into a scurrying lizard instead of a butterfly. ......I could have done anything.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I had moved my fingers a different way, the ring could have flown into the air instead of just dancing, and I could have turned it into a scurrying lizard instead of a butterfly. ......I could have done anything.
PC Japanese (JP): もし、別の指の動かし方をしていたら、ダンスでなく、宙を羽ばたかせることも、蝶でなく、トカゲに変えてベッドを駆け回ることも、……何でも出来た。
Russian (RU): Если бы я двинула пальцами по‐другому, вместо простого танца кольцо могло бы взмыть в воздух, а вместо бабочки я могла бы превратить ключ в снующую ящерицу. ......Можно сделать что угодно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se eu tivesse movido meus dedos de forma diferente, o chaveiro poderia ter voado pelo ar ao invés de só dançar, e eu poderia até ter transformando ele em um lagarto ao invés de uma borboleta. ......Eu poderia ter feito qualquer coisa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 如果，貝阿朵施展了別的指法，不是跳舞，而是展翅飛向天空，不是蝴蝶，而是令它變成蜥蜴，在床上飛快地爬來爬去，……什麼都做得到。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 如果，贝阿朵施展了别的指法，不是跳舞，而是展翅飞向天空，不是蝴蝶，而是令它变成蜥蜴，在床上飞快地爬来爬去，……什么都做得到。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se avessi mosso in una maniera differente le mie dita, l'anello sarebbe potuto volare nell'aria anziché danzare, e avrei potuto tramutarlo in una frettolosa lucertola anziché in una farfalla. ... Avrei potuto fare di tutto.

Steam (ST): True, {f:5:Beatrice}'s magical power was still weak.
Umineko Project (UP): True, {f:5:Beatrice}'s magical power was still weak.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): True, Beatrice's magical power was still weak.
PC Japanese (JP): 確かにベアトリーチェの魔力は未だ弱い。
Russian (RU): Да, магическая сила {f:5:Беатриче} по‐прежнему слаба.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): É verdade, o poder mágico da {f:5:Beatrice} ainda está enfraquecido.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 的確，貝阿朵莉切的魔力尚很微弱。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 的确，贝阿朵莉切的魔力尚很微弱。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Vero, la forza magica di Beatrice era ancora debole.

Steam (ST): It had all happened in the little world behind the backs of the servants, who were filled with anti-magic toxin.
Umineko Project (UP): It had all happened in the little world behind the backs of the servants filled with the anti‐magic toxin.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It had all happened in the little world behind the backs of the servants filled with the anti-magic toxin.
PC Japanese (JP): 反魔法の毒素を持つ鐘音さんたちが背中を向けてくれた束の間の世界の出来事。
Russian (RU): Всё произошло в крошечном мире за спинами слуг, наполненных отрицающим магию токсином.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tudo aconteceu no pequeno mundo atrás das costas das serviçais repletas de toxina antimagia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這些都是，身懷反魔法毒素的鐘音她們背過身去時的，轉瞬即逝的世界中所發生的事。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这些都是，身怀反魔法毒素的钟音她们背过身去时的，转瞬即逝的世界中所发生的事。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era accaduto tutto nel piccolo mondo dietro le spalle delle domestiche piene di tossina anti-magia.

Steam (ST): However, inside that tiny, short-lived world, I could do anything at all. Beato just happened to settle on making them dance and turning the key into a butterfly. But if she'd wanted to, she could've done anything else!
Umineko Project (UP): However, inside that tiny, short‐lived world, I could have done anything at all.{n}Beato just happened to settle on making the keys dance and turning one into a butterfly.{n}But if she wanted to, she could have done anything else!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, inside that tiny, short-lived world, I could do anything at all. Beato just happened to settle on making them dance and turning the key into a butterfly. But if she wanted to, she could have done anything else!
PC Japanese (JP): しかし、その束の間の世界では、何でも出来た。ベアトは、たまたま、躍らせて、蝶にしただけ。でも、もしも望んだなら、他のことも何でも出来た！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかし、その束の間の世界では、何でも出来た。{n}ベアトは、たまたま、躍らせて、蝶にしただけ。{n}でも、もしも望んだなら、他のことも何でも出来た！
Russian (RU): Однако в этом крошечном, мимолётном мире можно было сделать что угодно.{n}Беато просто сделала так, чтобы они закружили, и превратила ключ в бабочку.{n}Но при желании она могла бы сделать что‐нибудь ещё!
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas, dentro daquele minúsculo e momentâneo mundo, eu poderia ter feito qualquer coisa.{n}A Beato apenas optou por fazer as chaves dançarem e se transformarem em borboletas.{n}Mas, se quisesse, ela também poderia ter feito qualquer coisa!
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 但是，在這轉瞬即逝的世界中，她無所不能。{n}貝阿朵僅僅是純屬偶然地令鑰匙跳起了舞，把鑰匙變成了蝴蝶。{n}不過，只要她想要，別的任何事也都做得到！
Chinese Simplified (CN): 但是，在这转瞬即逝的世界中，她无所不能。{n}贝阿朵仅仅是纯属偶然地令钥匙跳起了舞，把钥匙变成了蝴蝶。{n}不过，只要她想要，别的任何事也都做得到！
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Tuttavia, in quel minuscolo, effimero mondo, potevo fare qualunque cosa. {n}È capitato che Beato abbia deciso di farle danzare e di tramutare la chiave in una farfalla. Ma se avesse voluto, avrebbe potuto fare qualcos'altro!

Steam (ST): The endless sensation of that free, unrestricted power... I could still feel it in my fingertips.
Umineko Project (UP): The endless sensation of that free, unrestricted power...{n}I could still feel it in my fingertips.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The endless sensation of that free, unrestricted power... I could still feel it in my fingertips.
PC Japanese (JP): あの自由な、何の制約もない力の無限の感触。まだこの指先に残ってる。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): あの自由な、何の制約もない力の無限の感触。{n}まだこの指先に残ってる。
Russian (RU): Бесконечное ощущение свободной, безграничной власти...{n}Я до сих пор чувствовала его в кончиках пальцев.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A eterna sensação de liberdade, de poder irrestrito...{n}Eu ainda podia senti‐los na ponta dos meus dedos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那自由自在毫無任何約束的力量的，無限的感觸。{n}依然殘留在我的指尖。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那自由自在毫无任何约束的力量的，无限的感触。{n}依然残留在我的指尖。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): L'infinita sensazione di quel libero, illimitato potere... potevo ancora percepirla nei miei polpastrelli.

Steam (ST): Could it be that, along with that sensation, a fragment of that magical power might also remain...?
Umineko Project (UP): Could it be that, along with that sensation, a sliver of that magical power might also remain...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Could it be that, along with that sensation, a fragment of that magical power might also remain...?
PC Japanese (JP): 感触だけでなく、魔力の欠片がわずかほどでも残っていたりはしないだろうか…？
Russian (RU): Что если вместе с этим ощущением осталась и часть той магической силы?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Poderia ser que, junto com aquela sensação, um resquício daquele poder mágico ainda tenha permanecido...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我的指尖會不會，不只是感觸，還至少有稍微一點點地殘留著魔力的碎渣呢…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我的指尖会不会，不只是感触，还至少有稍微一点点地残留着魔力的碎渣呢…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Potrebbe essere che, assieme a quella sensazione, potrebbe essere rimasto anche un frammento di quel potere magico...?

Steam (ST): I can tell. It's still there. ...There's still just a bit of it there, along with that sensation.
Umineko Project (UP): I can tell. It's still there. .........There's still just a bit of it there, along with that sensation.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I can tell. It's still there. ......There's still just a bit of it there, along with that sensation.
PC Japanese (JP): わかる。残ってる。………まだちょっとだけ、感触と共に残ってる。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Assolutamente. Quella stanza è troppo rozza per dare in essa il benvenuto ai miei amici e servire il tè. Cambieremo le stanze. Andiamo, amica mia...!"

Umineko Project (UP): ".........So, this is goodbye to Shannon."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "......So, this is goodbye to Shannon."

Umineko Project (UP): When I looked at my feet, ......I could see my own dorm room far beneath me.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Steam (ST): I could see Shannon, who had dashed up to the bed I lay on and had been saying "wait" at the moment time froze. She was as rigid as a doll.
Umineko Project (UP): I could see Shannon, who had dashed up to the bed I lay on and had been saying "wait" at the moment time froze. She was as rigid as a doll.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I could see Shannon, who had dashed up to the bed I lay on and had been saying 'wait' at the moment time froze. She was as rigid as a doll.
PC Japanese (JP): 私が横になっているベッドに駆け寄り、待って、と言ったまま時間が止まり、人形のように硬直している紗音が見える。
Russian (RU): Шаннон застыла на том моменте, когда бросилась к моей кровати, сказав 'Подожди'. Она была тверда как кукла.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu pude ver a Shannon, que saiu correndo até a cama que eu estava, enquanto dizia "espere", no momento em que o tempo congelou. Ela estava rígida como uma boneca.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我能看見，跑向我躺著的床邊的紗音，口中還在說著“等一等”，時間就迎來了停止，像人偶般一動不動地杵在那裡。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我能看见，跑向我躺着的床边的纱音，口中还在说着“等一等”，时间就迎来了停止，像人偶般一动不动地杵在那里。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Riuscii a vedere Shannon, che era corsa al letto in cui giacevo e stava dicendo ‘aspetta’ nel momento in cui il tempo si fermò. Era rigida quanto una bambola.

Steam (ST): Looking down at it from this height, it really did look like a small dollhouse...
Umineko Project (UP): Looking down at it from this height, it really did look like a small dollhouse...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Looking down at it from this height, it really did look like a small dollhouse...
PC Japanese (JP): この高みから見下ろすと、それはまるで、小さな人形とそのお家みたいだ…。
Russian (RU): С такой высоты это сильно напоминало кукольный домик...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Olhando para baixo dessa altura, realmente faz parecer como uma casinha de bonecas...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從這個高度往下看，這簡直就像小娃娃與她的家似的…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从这个高度往下看，这简直就像小娃娃与她的家似的…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Guardandola da quest'altezza, sembrava veramente una piccola casa per le bambole...

Speaker: {f:5:Beatrice}
Steam (ST): "So long, Shannon. ...The days I spent as a Human, with you as a goal and a constant comfort, were truly fun. ...If I had never learned the joys of magic and awakened as a witch, everything would doubtless have remained as it was."
Umineko Project (UP): "Farewell, Shannon. ......The days I spent as a {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}, growing our friendship as I attempted to emulate you, were truly fun. ...If I had never learned the joys of magic and awakened as a witch, everything would doubtless have remained as it was."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "So long, Shannon. ......The days I spent as a human, with you as a goal and a constant comfort, were truly fun. ...If I had never learned the joys of magic and awakened as a witch, everything would doubtless have remained as it was."
PC Japanese (JP): 「さらばだ、紗音。……ニンゲンとして、そなたを目標に、そなたと友情を育みながらの日々も、楽しいものであったぞ。…もし妾が、魔法の悦楽を知ることなく、魔女に開眼することがなかったなら、それはこれからも変わらなかったであろうな。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「さらばだ、紗音。……ニンゲンとして、そなたを目標に、そなたと友情を育みながらの日々も、楽しいものであったぞ。…もし妾が、魔法の悦楽を知ることなく、魔女に開眼することがなかったなら、それはこれからも変わらなかったであろうな」
Russian (RU): "Прощай, Шаннон. ......Человеческая жизнь с тобой — моей целью и постоянным утешением — была хороша. ...Если бы я не познала радости магии и не пробудилась ведьмой, всё, несомненно, осталось бы как было."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Adeus, Shannon. ......Os dias que passei como um ser {y:0:Humano}{n:0:humano}, desenvolvendo nossa amizade em uma tentativa de emulá‐la, foram realmente divertidos. ...Se eu nunca tivesse aprendido os prazeres da magia e despertado como bruxa, sem dúvida, tudo teria permanecido como era."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「再見了，紗音。……作為人類，以汝為目標，與汝一起培養友情的那段日子，也很是開心。…如果，妾身沒有嘗到魔法的樂趣，沒有覺醒為魔女的話，這種生活，今後也是不會發生改變的吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「再见了，纱音。……作为人类，以汝为目标，与汝一起培养友情的那段日子，也很是开心。…如果，妾身没有尝到魔法的乐趣，没有觉醒为魔女的话，这种生活，今后也是不会发生改变的吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Arrivederci, Shannon. ... I giorni spesi come essere umano, con te come obiettivo e costante conforto, sono stati, invero, divertenti. ... Se non avessi mai conosciuto le gioie della magia e non mi fossi risvegliata come una strega, senza dubbio, tutto sarebbe rimasto come all'inizio."

Steam (ST): ...I was your only close friend too, wasn't I? Please forgive me for erasing that friend so suddenly.
Umineko Project (UP): .........I was your only close friend as well, wasn't I?{n}Please forgive me for erasing that friend so suddenly.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......I was your only close friend too, wasn't I? Please forgive me for erasing that friend so suddenly.

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ………そなたにとっても、妾が唯一の親友であったな。{n}その親友が、忽然と消え去ることをどうか許してほしい。

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Sua única amizade era eu, não era?{n}Por favor, me perdoe por apagar essa amizade de forma tão abrupta.

Chinese Simplified (CN): ………对汝来说也是一样呢，妾身是汝唯一的好友。{n}希望汝能原谅，这位好友的突然消失。

Umineko Project (UP): As a parting gift, ......I will erase "me" from your world.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As a parting gift, ......I will erase 'me' from your world.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como presente de despedida, ......eu iriei "me" apagar do seu mundo.

Umineko Project (UP): Starting now, this will not be a two‐person room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Starting now, this will not be a two-person room.

Umineko Project (UP): It will be a single‐person room, with just you in it.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It will be a single-person room, with just you in it.

Steam (ST): I hope you continue to strive for your ideal and try to become a kind, reliable servant loved by everyone.
Umineko Project (UP): Strive to be a kind, reliable servant loved by everyone, and embody that ideal as you always have.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I hope you continue to strive for your ideal and try to become a kind, reliable servant loved by everyone.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Yasu — serviçal imbecil e negligente que sempre perdia as coisas — já não existe mais.

Umineko Project (UP): Apparently, I had gotten out of bed, stretched my hand out towards it, ......and said "wait".
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Apparently, I had gotten out of bed, stretched my hand out towards it, ...and said 'wait'.

Umineko Project (UP): ......I don't remember ever waking up to find myself out of bed and standing up.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu sequer me lembro de ter acordado e saído da cama para estar de pé aqui agora.

Steam (ST): Could this be what they call...sleepwalking...?
Umineko Project (UP): Could this be what they call......sleepwalking...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Could this be what they call......sleepwalking...?

Chinese Simplified (CN): 难道这是，……曾有耳闻的，梦游症么…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Potrebbe essere ciò che chiamano... sonnambulismo...?

Umineko Project (UP): Am I just tired......?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我，是累了麼……？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我，是累了么……？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sono solo stanca...?

Steam (ST): ...Gotta sleep. Gotta get back to sleep.
Umineko Project (UP): ......Gotta sleep. Gotta get back to sleep.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Meglio dormire. Devo tornare a letto.

Steam (ST): I turned around to face my bed.
Umineko Project (UP): I turned around to face my bed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I turned around to face my bed.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu me virei para a cama.

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Traditional (CHT): [=JP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JP]

Steam (ST): My bed wasn't there. There was no bed in this room except the one I had just turned my back on.
Umineko Project (UP): My bed wasn't there.{n}There was no bed in this room except the one I had just turned my back on.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): My bed wasn't there. There was no bed in this room except the one I had just turned my back on.
PC Japanese (JP): 振り返ったところで、自分のベッドなどそこにはない。今、背を向けたベッドしか、この部屋にはないのだから。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 振り返ったところで、自分のベッドなどそこにはない。{n}今、背を向けたベッドしか、この部屋にはないのだから。
Russian (RU): Моей кровати там не было.{n}Была только та кровать, к которой я только что повернулась спиной.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Minha cama não estava ali.{n}Não havia nenhuma cama além daquela na qual eu acabei de dar as costas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 轉身一看，那裡根本沒有自己的床。{n}而這是因為，這個房間裡，只有，此刻，我背對著的那一張床。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 转身一看，那里根本没有自己的床。{n}而这是因为，这个房间里，只有，此刻，我背对着的那一张床。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il mio letto non era lì. Non c'era nessun letto in questa stanza oltre a quello a cui avevo appena dato le spalle.

Steam (ST): If I'm the only one in this room, and the only bed is the one behind me, ...that must mean it's my bed.
Umineko Project (UP): If I'm the only one in this room, and the only bed is the one behind me, ......that must mean it's my bed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): If I'm the only one in this room, and the only bed is the one behind me, ......that must mean it's my bed.
PC Japanese (JP): この部屋にいるのは私一人で、ベッドも私の背中に一つしかないなら……、……それはつまり、私のベッドということではないか。
Russian (RU): Если в этой комнате только я, а единственная кровать — позади меня...... значит, она и есть моя.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Se sou a única neste quarto, e a única cama é aquela atrás de mim, ......então esta deve ser a minha cama.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 既然這房間裡只有我一個人，床也只有我背後的那一張床……，……那麼這也就是代表著，那是我的床吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 既然这房间里只有我一个人，床也只有我背后的那一张床……，……那么这也就是代表着，那是我的床吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Se sono da sola in questa stanza, e l'unico letto è quello dietro di me... deve significare che è il mio letto.

Steam (ST): ...That feels wrong, for some reason.
Umineko Project (UP): ......That feels wrong, for some reason.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): ……なぜだか、釈然としない。
Russian (RU): ......Но что‐то не так.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Por algum motivo, isso parece errado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不知為什麼，就是無法釋然。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不知为什么，就是无法释然。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Non so perché, ma sembra sbagliato.

Steam (ST): The bed sheets are all disarranged, as though someone had slipped out of them.
Umineko Project (UP): The bed sheets are all disarranged, as though someone slipped out of them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The bed sheets are all disarranged, as though someone had slipped out of them.
PC Japanese (JP): ベッドの布団は、誰かが這い出たように、乱れている。
Russian (RU): Одеяло смято, будто из‐под него кто‐то выскочил.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Os lençóis estão desarrumados, como se alguém a tivesse deixado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 床上的棉被，就像是曾有人從中爬出般，顯得很亂。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 床上的棉被，就像是曾有人从中爬出般，显得很乱。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Le lenzuola sono tutte disfatte, come se qualcuno fosse sgattaiolato fuori da esse.

Steam (ST): Who did...? This is a single-person room with me in it, right?
Umineko Project (UP): "Someone"...? This is my own, single‐person room.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Who did...? This is a single-person room with me in it, right?
PC Japanese (JP): 誰かが這い出た…？この部屋は、私の一人部屋じゃないか。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 誰かが這い出た…？　この部屋は、私の一人部屋じゃないか。
Russian (RU): Кто?.. В этой одноместной комнате только я, так?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Alguém"...? Este é o meu quarto de solteiro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 曾有人從棉被裡爬了出來…？這個房間，不是我的單人房嘛。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 曾有人从棉被里爬了出来…？这个房间，不是我的单人房嘛。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Chi è stato...? Questa è una stanza singola con me all'interno, giusto?

Steam (ST): So, that there is my bed, and the traces of someone crawling out... mean that I was just sleeping there until a second ago...?
Umineko Project (UP): So, that there is my bed, and the rumpled sheets mean...that I was just sleeping there until a second ago, don't they...?
Original Witch Hunt (OG): So, that there is my bed, and the traces of someone crawling out... mean that I was just sleeping there until a second ago...?
PC Japanese (JP): なら、それは私のベッドであり、這い出た跡とはつまり、私がさっきまでこの布団に寝ていたということではないのか…？
Russian (RU): Если это моя кровать, и кажется, будто с неё кто‐то соскочил... Разве не значит, что я секунду назад спала там?..
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, esta é a minha cama, e esses lençóis amassados significam...que eu estive dormindo aqui até um segundo atrás, certo...?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 那麼，這就是我的床，而“有誰從棉被裡爬了出去”的痕跡不就代表著，我直到剛才為止，一直都睡在那棉被之中麼…？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 那么，这就是我的床，而“有谁从棉被里爬了出去”的痕迹不就代表着，我直到刚才为止，一直都睡在那棉被之中么…？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quindi, quello là è il mio letto, e le tracce di qualcuno che ne è uscito fuori... significano che stavo dormendo lì fino ad un secondo fa...?

Umineko Project (UP): ......But, for some reason, .........that bed......doesn't feel like my bed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......But, for some reason... that bed...... doesn't feel like my bed.

Steam (ST): However, though all the other kids shared rooms, I, Shannon, was given a single-person room.
Umineko Project (UP): But I, Shannon, have a single‐person room—I was the only person to be given one while all the other kids had to share.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): However, though all the other kids shared rooms, I, Shannon, was given a single-person room.

Umineko Project (UP): So, there's only one bed.{n}And it must be mine.

Steam (ST): And, when school ends, I want to go to the mansion, help out with some work, and talk to Kumasawa-san about the mystery novel I just read.
Umineko Project (UP): And after school, I'll go to the mansion, help out with some work, and then I want to talk to Kumasawa‐san about the mystery novel I just read.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And, when school ends, I want to go to the mansion, help out with some work, and talk to Kumasawa-san about the mystery novel I just read.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、学校が終わったら、お屋敷に行って、少しお仕事の手伝いをしてから、熊沢さんとまた、読んだばかりの推理小説を語り合いたい。
Russian (RU): А когда уроки закончатся, надо будет пойти в особняк помочь с работой и обсудить с Кумасавой только что прочитанный детектив.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，上完学，去大屋稍微帮忙干下活后，我想再和熊泽婆婆，讨论一下刚读完的推理小说。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): E, finita la scuola, voglio andare alla residenza, aiutare con dei lavori, e parlare con Kumasawa-san sul romanzo giallo che ho appena letto.

Speaker: Shannon
Steam (ST): "Time to sleep. I'm probably just so worn out that I'm imagining things. ...Goodnight, Shannon. Just crawl in bed and close your eyes, ...and you won't have to think about anything complicated..."
Umineko Project (UP): "Time to sleep. I'm probably just so worn out that I'm imagining things. .........Good night, Shannon. Just crawl in bed and close your eyes......and you won't have to think about anything complicated......"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Time to sleep. I'm probably just so worn out that I'm imagining things. ......Goodnight, Shannon. Just crawl in bed and close your eyes......and you won't have to think about anything complicated......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「寝よう。きっと、疲れてるからおかしなことを考えちゃうのね。………おやすみなさい、紗音。布団に包まれて、静かに目を閉じれば。……もう、何も難しいことは考えなくていいんだよ……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「寝よう。きっと、疲れてるからおかしなことを考えちゃうのね。………おやすみなさい、紗音。布団に包まれて、静かに目を閉じれば。……もう、何も難しいことは考えなくていいんだよ……」
Russian (RU): "Пора спать. Я просто так измотана, что мне мерещится. ......Спокойной ночи, Шаннон. Заберись в постель и закрой глаза...... Так тебе не придётся думать ни о чём сложном......"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Hora de dormir. Provavelmente só estou exausta de ficar imaginando coisas. .........Boa noite, Shannon. Apenas seja envolvida por sua cama e feche seus olhos......assim não terá que pensar em mais nada complicado......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「睡吧。一定是人累了，所以才會想到些莫名其妙的東西。………晚安，紗音。只要被包裹在棉被中，靜靜地閉上眼睛。……你就再也不用去想，任何複雜的事了哦……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「睡吧。一定是人累了，所以才会想到些莫名其妙的东西。………晚安，纱音。只要被包裹在棉被中，静静地闭上眼睛。……你就再也不用去想，任何复杂的事了哦……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Ora di dormire. Probabilmente sono talmente stremata da immaginarmi le cose. ... Buonanotte, Shannon. Infilati nel letto e chiudi gli occhi... e non dovrai pensare a nulla di complicato..."

Steam (ST): I went back into my bed.
Umineko Project (UP): I went back into my bed.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]

Umineko Project (UP): It felt a bit uncomfortable to crawl into a bed that wasn't mine.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It felt a bit uncomfortable to crawl into a bed that wasn't mine.
PC Japanese (JP): 自分のじゃない布団に潜ることに対する、わずかの嫌悪がチリチリとする。

Steam (ST): Still, it might just be because I'm getting so sleepy, but it's starting to feel as though this is my bed after all.
Umineko Project (UP): Still, it might just be because I'm getting so sleepy, but it's starting to feel as though this is my bed after all.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Still, it might just be because I'm getting so sleepy, but it's starting to feel as though this is my bed after all.

Umineko Project (UP): .........I'm just half‐asleep......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......I'm just half-asleep......

Speaker: Shannon

Umineko Project (UP): I mess up from time to time, ......but I want to become a kind servant whom everyone loves......
Original Witch Hunt (OG): I mess up from time to time, ......but I want to become a kind servant whom everyone loves......
